name: .NOVABACKUP
summary: Learn about .NOVABACKUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a NOVABACKUP file in Nova Launcher (Android), for use as your Android device's home screen. To do so, open Nova Launcher and select the app's menu button. Then, select Nova Settings → Backup and Import → Import. Finally, navigate to and select your NOVABACKUP file.
